> [leftside](#comment_2_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): You'd better do https://translate.google.com/ rather than writing the broken english.

Google Translate can also produce broken English sentences like that one: 
- Did you step through Tor?
- Are you crossing Tor?
- Did they enter Tor? 
The last was the back and forth translation of zoe00's sentence between English and my native language. The first two are the guessed intended question of zoe00 translated by Google from its two correct versions in my native language.
